ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Vesālī in the hall with the peaked roof in the Great Wood.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.2_0: Venerable Upāli’s preceptor, Venerable Kappita, was staying in a charnel ground.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.3_0: At that time the leader of the nuns from the group of six had just died.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.4_0: They took her to that charnel ground, cremated her near Venerable Kappita’s dwelling, and made a stupa. They then went there to cry.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.5_0: Venerable Kappita was disturbed by the noise, and so he demolished the stupa and scattered the rubble.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.6_0: The nuns from the group of six thought,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.7_0: “Kappita has demolished our Venerable’s stupa; let’s kill him,” and they laid a plan.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.8_0: A certain nun told Venerable Upāli what was happening,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.10_0: But Venerable Kappita left his dwelling and then left.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.11_0: Soon afterwards the nuns from the group of six went to his dwelling
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.12_0: and crushed it with rocks and lumps of earth. When they thought he was dead, they left.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.13_0: The following morning Venerable Kappita robed up, took his bowl and robe, and entered Vesālī for almsfood.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.14_0: When the nuns from the group of six saw him,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.16_0: “Kappita is alive! Who foiled our plan?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.20_0: “How could this barber, this dirt remover of inferior birth, foil our plan?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.21_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.22_0: “How could the nuns from the group of six abuse Venerable Upāli?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.23_0: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.26_0: “... How can the nuns from the group of six abuse Venerable Upāli?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.27_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.28_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:1.29.1_0: ‘If a nun abuses or reviles a monk, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.1.8_0: If she abuses or insults, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.1.10_0: if she attends on him when he is fearful, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.2.1_0: If he is fully ordained, and she perceives him as such, and she abuses or reviles him, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.2.2_0: If he is fully ordained, but she is unsure of it, and she abuses or reviles him, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.2.3_0: If the other person is fully ordained, but she does not perceive them as such, and she abuses or reviles him, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.2.4_0: If she abuses or reviles someone who is not fully ordained, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.2.5_0: If the other person is not fully ordained, but she perceives them as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.2.6_0: If he is not fully ordained, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.2.7_0: If the other person is not fully ordained, and she does not perceive them as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.3.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.3.2_0: if she is aiming at what is beneficial;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.3.3_0: if he is aiming at giving a teaching;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.3.4_0: if she is aiming at giving an instruction;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.3.6_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc52:2.3.7_0: The second training rule is finished.
